name: Windhome 95
description:
We spent so much time together, you were here to protect me. 

Why did you leave our home to go so far away ? 

You were missing when we needed you the most. I am here, lost and imprisoned… It is your fault. Everything is gone now, the fire ate it all. You're Hazel, a young woman from New England, now living in switzerland. Your family recently died in a tragic fire that burnt down the whole house. You went back to the house, heartbroken, and found, miraculously intact, the old computer of your young brother, Emmett. 

Will you find what happened in the old house?

Don't forget to look at the trailer to know more about the story.

Credits: 

Developer : Lucas Junker & Aurélien Panhaleux

Game Designer : Antoine Chabirand, Camille David & Meihdi Ellahiani

Graphic Designer : Pierre Laloge, Romain Le Leydour & Barbara Ouvrard
